title.rendered: Air Creebec in Val-d’Or QC, Canada

content.rendered:
Air Creebec is a regional airline based in Val-d’Or, Quebec, Canada. It operates scheduled and charter services to 16 destinations in Quebec and Ontario. Its main base is Val-d’Or Airport, with a hub at Timmins/Victor M. Power Airport.The airline was established in June 1982 and started operations on 1 July 1982. At that time the Cree owned 51% of the company and Austin Airways owned the remaining 49%.

 

Air Creebec Val-d’Or QC, Canada Address:
101 Fecteau Street 
Val d’Or, Quebec J9P 0G4

Phone:
819 825-8375

Email: YVOcounter@aircreebec.ca

Working hours

Air Creebec Customer care number: 1-800-567-6567

Air Creebec Customer care Email: info@aircreebec.ca

Air Creebec Official website: http://www.aircreebec.ca/english/index.html

Air Creebec Online Check-in: www.aircreebec.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note: Check in online check-in 60 minutes prior to the scheduled departure time.
For the flights leaving Montreal, the cut off time for check-in at the Montreal counter for the morning flights is 06:45.

Check Air Creebec schedule here: www.aircreebec.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Air Creebec flight status here: www.aircreebec.com/in/gb/flight status

Air Creebec Reservation Number

Tel: 1-800-567-6567, 819-825-8355

Reservation Hours:

Sunday: 06:30 – 17:00
Monday: 06:30 – 18:00
Thuesday: 06:30 – 18:00
Wednesday: 06:30 – 18:00
Thursday: 06:30 – 18:00
Friday: 06:30 – 18:00
Saturday: 06:30 – 16:00
